title: So kayn's shadow assassin is at an 8 second cooldown at all ranks
body:
Despite it previously not even making it to 8 seconds at rank 5.

This is why Riot needs to start doing mandatory drug screenings in the workplace. It's also why I'm glad I left six months ago.

replies.body:
> Despite it previously not even making it to 8 seconds at rank 5.

Congratulations, that's exactly the point: giving to a form something the other one can't have.

I left this game, but I still keep up with balance changes.

Makes sense.

>
> I left this game, but I still keep up with balance changes.
> 
> Makes sense.

Actually, I just saw a meme about it on Facebook. Otherwise, I'd had never known

Makes sense.

Hey, having been demoted by two rage quitters, I contacted Riot support and they gave me the bird. Therefore, I raise as much hell as I can here.

> [{quoted}](name=afmghost,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FmbdLWkP,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2019-04-17T00:03:11.855+0000)
>
> Hey, having been demoted by two rage quitters, I contacted Riot support and they gave me the bird. Therefore, I raise as much hell as I can here.

Translation: I’m bitter I didn’t get my way so instead of being an adult and moving past it, I’m going to try (futilely) to ruin people’s lives, got it.

Here a see Jamaree, a League of Legends White Knight in its natural habitat.

What a fascinating yet repulsive creature!

This person disagreed with me. They must be a:

a) white knight
b) snowflake
c) rioter in disguise
d) SJW
e) some other generic, lazy insult that you try to use when someone else makes a factual statement that you don't like

> [{quoted}](name=afmghost,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FmbdLWkP,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-04-17T02:35:17.229+0000)
>
> Here a see Jamaree, a League of Legends White Knight in its natural habitat.
> 
> What a fascinating yet repulsive creature!

And here we see the bitter entitled gamer, thinking they know better then others at all time.
Blue kayne has been very weak the past 4 months.
I mean. The change is nice, but not super impactful overall. If anything it’s a really nice increase to his sustain.

Man, I have gotten my fill of all this suck up anger!

*Pats stomach*

I need to wait a bit before dessert.

> [{quoted}](name=afmghost,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FmbdLWkP,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-04-16T23:59:30.230+0000)

Still makes SA an auto lose if you don’t end by 20 mins.
